content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (6.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing coal in furnaces
- Ensure to regularly check and maintain coal levels in inventory to avoid running out of fuel for the furnaces.
- Consider setting up a dedicated coal supply line to feed the furnaces automatically.

### Errors when attempting to insert items into furnaces
- Not enough coal left in inventory to insert into the furnace at specified positions indicates that the agent should gather more coal before attempting to operate the furnaces.
